topic.title: Tracker v3 zite list
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/13hNAdge5ntxJmcnKzAxeLCuyowJkdvFxF/

This list Will include all v3 trackers created and Is manager by anonymouse. He want to create something similar to syncronite Only for tor v3 hidden service

topic.title: We Need more v3 trackers! Please contribute with your devices!
topic.body: If you stay online many hours per day and have a Linux machine with a tor installation please consider to set up a tracker with a permanent v3 address! We are creating more trackers now but we Need more collaboration also from domestic nodes also to decentralize the network. Use the styromaniac tutorial

1631935740_1AmXimBQuPemuoTM9NFYg9Mn5YY6H.body:
> [xcape2net](#comment_979_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): So that means we'll have to use a non-tor browser with ZeroNet?  Is there now a WORKING ZeroNet patch or fork that supports v3?  I've seen multiple conversations on ZeroTalk, but I'm unclear if something exists that actually works.

A Dev Is working with me to the v3 patch that Actually works on Linux and Android. Windows Need some fixes

1631986324_1BxrMQR2odvohNyH3mgZo1z9fkj4q.body: Im not managing this zite, the creator of v3 patch manage It. He told me that he want to script tracker finding in future

> [styroonashitphon](#comment_5_1NceP4NFjHrUbHM7dLUxyLtXbTCrgmgRda): The first tracker on your list does not work. Please remove it.

Probably was a temporary adresss of One of my tracker's...Will be removed
I temporary disabled the tracker inside my seedbox to allow seeding of files...Is the id that begin with 2kcb2...

1632037357_1BxrMQR2odvohNyH3mgZo1z9fkj4q.body:
> [xcape2net](#comment_982_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): How much bandwidth is required for a tracker?

I think not much.vuse 500 mb in an entire day

1632662049_1BkheWe7wwX2r3HuRQunHFu9jTMtC.body:
> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_106_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): I tell people that I use ZeroNet without embarrassment nor shame.

Same! 🤣🤣🤣 My blog have many articles and Pages about zeronet! 🤣 Https://antonellogalati.com

1632914802_13JuGiUNQFGijiA5NWsKsgv8YWBus.body:
> [darkasnight](#comment_8_13JuGiUNQFGijiA5NWsKsgv8YWBus5NvV1): Thanks, i use linux.i was trying to write a installation guide  for v3 patch in persian :)

There Is also a Linux version. 🙂

1633498111_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8B.body:
> [darkasnight](#comment_10_13JuGiUNQFGijiA5NWsKsgv8YWBus5NvV1): Can't we just make another HelloZeronet and modify it how we want?I think we should do that for every zites that nofish created, we can't wait for him to improve these zites.

I Will modify this in my zeroseed pack soon 🙂 thanks!

1632925044_19TrKZA9ifR8bvPbL64AbNqttCDkW.body:
> [saqat](#comment_7_14NiXkEXrFAHokAohyiCv5PCAXLcEsvEUp): Anyone mind explaining what this is to a newcomer?

Zeronet with the v3 patch already installed and a new zerohello 🙂

> [macosquestions](#comment_2_18fkVYZKgknM2YED1Te7sW1U2PNyjeJTt1): “ZeroNet” is damaged and can’t be opened. You should move it to the Trash. [...]

I dont have a Mac and i created this release but not tested It...☹️ I Will find a way

> [obrien1984](#comment_6_14a6MrpmfdWZ9543vTNP8Co6Fa4S7M9Mq9): Can you please post the git related links, I am not downloading random files from mega

Anonymouse Is creating a fork of zeronet code with the patch included . Actually my packs are simple zeronet 0.72 + v3 patch. Im not a programmer and i cant create a git
